content.value:
My friend is building an app about referral codes whch depends on having codes, not sending emails.

Some sites have codes, some force you to send an email.

Is this a technical limitation? The simplest design? Are they afraid of fraud? 

🤔 Anyone know?
content.html: My friend is building an app about referral codes whch depends on having codes, not sending emails. Some sites have codes, some force you to send an email. Is this a technical limitation? The simplest design? Are they afraid of fraud? 🤔 Anyone know?
